A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow! This movie was awful. There were so many examples of bad storytelling. There were plot holes and useless subplots that killed the pace of the movie. There were main characters that were underdeveloped or badly written. There was parody humor in what was supposed to be a serious Star Wars film. The execution of character development was bad. This is the first movie Ive ever watched where theres gravity in outer space and that humans are able to breath oxygen also. I have no interest in watching any future Star Wars films.
